segments.text: Here are the plans for the new finished goods warehouse . Do you have any thoughts or comments ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think the plans look good . There's just one thing though , I'm a bit concerned about the main lorry entrance . What's the height clearance ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you sure that's high enough ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's a good point . I'll make a note to increase it to 4.80 to make sure we can accept the new containers .
segments.speaker: S1
